title: Mage Masteries
body:
Unless you're a champ like Brand or Malz, Ferocity doesn't provide Mages with a single noteworthy keystone mastery.  The only reason Mages would go past the 4th tier in that tree is if they want the 7% magic pen.  However, those who use Hybrid runes are *probably* better off going with Precision, anyway.

Ignoring the fact that Riot fked up the Ferocity tree's keystone masteries, what do you think is the best path for Mages?
